★★★★tmzVPS Premium Managed & Unmanaged VPS | Quality Service★★★★

TmzVPS.com was launched to set a new standard for internet VPS web hosting. We are currently offering hosting solutions that compete with some of the largest hosting providers. Specialized VPS hosting at rock bottom prices. We have VPS's available in the Orlando, Florida - US, Los Angeles, California - US & United Kingdom. tmzVPS is backed up by TMZHosting LLC which has been in business for more than 5 years!

Coupon Code:

We are offering 50% OFF on all of our VPS plans in the United States (Florida & Los Angeles) and United Kingdom! Those are HUGE savings that can save you hundreds of dollars. Use the coupon code "50OFF1ST" to receive an account credit for 50% of the value of your first full month's payment. When you have completed your order, open a support ticket with our billing department to receive your credit.

  • 50OFF1ST << 50% OFF First Month or Quarter
  • WHT1020OFF << 10% OFF Monthly OR 20% OFF Yearly

==============================================

★★★★ All of our VPS plans are INSTANTLY SET UP and provisioned with cPanel/WHM so you don't have to wait hours or days to receive your login details. ★★★★

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What falls under Full Management?
A: We will do many things that other providers won't do. We will go over the top to help you with ANY questions you may have with our services. You can see more information on this here:http://www.tmzvps.com/managed-vps#tabs-3

Q: Which locations do you currently offer?
A: We currently have servers in the United States, United Kingdom. You can choose from any of the 2 locations when ordering through our website. More locations will be available soon like Texas & New Jersey.

Q: Why are your prices higher than other VPS hosting companies?
A: We currently have 24/7 ticket support with a 15 minute guaranteed reply. The cheaper VPS hosting companies will not offer that and stick to it. The reviews also tell you how stable and reliable our company is and has been for over 5 years.

Q: Are there any discounts if purchased Annually or Biennially?
A: Yes if you purchase Semi-Annually you will get 5% OFF, if you purchase Annually you will get 10% OFF.

Q: Will you transfer my website over to tmzVPS?
A: Yes if your other hosting company uses cPanel/WHM and has full ROOT access we will transfer your website to our services FREE of charge! If the provider uses another control panel we will try our best to move your site over.

Q: Which payment methods do you accept?
A: We currently accept Paypal, 2checkout (Used for VISA, MASTERCARD, DISCOVER, AMERICAN EXPRESS), Liberty Reserve, Google Checkout & AlertPay. More payment options coming soon!

Q: What is the average set up time?
A: All of our VPS plans are set up instantly. You will receive the cPanel/WHM login details right after payment is received. It takes approximately 45 minutes for cPanel to fully do it's updates and install the necessary scripts we include.

Q: Does tmzVPS have an affiliate program? (NEW)
A: Sure we do! Please visit http://www.tmzvps.com/affiliate for more information.

Most Asked Questions:

Q: Do you have un-managed plans, and do you customize plans?
A: We currently released our Unmanaged VPS Plans. You can view them at http://www.tmzvps.com/unmanaged-vps
If you need a plan customized please contact sales@tmzvps.com and our sales representatives will gladly help you.

Q: Who owns tmzVPS?
A: tmzVPS is owned and operated by TMZHosting LLC. tmzVPS is a sister website that offers only VPS plans at very competitive prices. Please read our ABOUT page for more information.

Looking forward to hosting you!
